title: Odd disconnection problem
body:
Pretty sure this is with LoL client rather then my internet. But I get this weird disconnect thing where I am still in game but my character just runs around and I can't do anything (basically auto attacks). Then even though my internet is 100% okay it doesn't reconnect. The easiest way to reconnect is to put the PC on standby and log back into my PC. Another way is to kill LoL through the Task Manager, but that takes FAR longer.
Tried to reinstall LoL to no avail, anyone else have similar odd issue?

replies.body:
Hey

How long have you been having the problem for?  Does it have any pattern or happen in certain situations more than others?

Cheers
Mindstar

Over a month or two now, it started happening a bit after Win10 release. If it does happen, as I recall, it usually happens early in the game (lane phase), and it will happen only once a game and no more (I believe).
One forum commenter noted it might have something to do with [IE/Edge](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/YR8kxJsX-trying-to-reconnect), but I haven't tried that yet.

That is an interesting idea, although I'm not sure how it would work.

That said, I'm not super familiar with Win10, but I'd also suggest going over the steps in [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a starting point.  I'd look at disabling IP helper and IPv6 as the first steps to try.

Let me know how you go.
I have weird d/c issues every so often. They're always varied. Always annoying. Restarting completely usually helps.
